# Additional Resources

Below are some other materials we think you might find helpful either as a rereference or as a tool to learn more about this topic.

## Working with Spatial Data

DataLab's [Cartography for Academic Publications Workshop](https://github.com/MicheleTobias/Workshop-Cartography-Journal-Figures)

DataLab's [Spatial Data Formats Workshop](https://ucdavisdatalab.github.io/workshop_spatial_data_formats/)

[maptimeDavis](https://maptimedavis.github.io/) - a welcoming community of practice focused on spatial data


## Learning & Using R

DataLab's [R Basics Workshop](https://ucdavisdatalab.github.io/workshop_r_basics/)

[Davis R Users Group](https://d-rug.github.io/) - a welcoming community of practice focused on using the R programming language

## Other Mapping in R Tutorials

[Plotting Simple Features](https://r-spatial.github.io/sf/articles/sf5.html)

[NCEAS R Color Cheatsheet](https://www.nceas.ucsb.edu/sites/default/files/2020-04/colorPaletteCheatsheet.pdf)

[Making beautiful inset maps in R using sf, ggplot2 and cowplot](https://upgo.lab.mcgill.ca/2019/12/13/making-beautiful-maps/)

[tmap website](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/)
